data.title: Heidi Klum lays on top of husband in tiny bikini as she addresses his 'strange diet'
data.meta_description: Heidi Klum has addressed rumours that she put her husband Tom Kaulitz on 'some strange diet' via her Instagram stories while wearing a bikini in Sardinia.
data.text:
Heidi Klum discusses putting husband on 'strange diet'

Supermodel Heidi Klum has addressed rumours that she has put her husband Tom Kaulitz on a "strange" diet.

The 50-year-old is currently on holiday with Tom, 33, in Sardinia and has been keeping fans updated on their trip via social media.

Today (July 12) Heidi took to her Instagram stories to conduct an impromptu question-and-answer session with her 11.2 million followers.

In one frame, a fan asked her what it was like to date Tom, to which she replied: “Amazing!”

Directing the question at her husband, she said: “My love, how is it being with me then?”

Read More Jonah Hill 'hated' Superbad co-star and tried to get him kicked out after attack

The 33-year-old stated that being married to the supermodel was “everything I ever wanted,” which made Heidi giggle.

Then, the America’s Got Talent judge said: “Oh, by the way, people think I put you on some strange diet.

Tom cheekily replied, “Yeah, it’s horrible”, before the pair burst into laughter.

Heidi, who was conducting the Q&A session in a ribbed black bikini, went on to answer more questions posted by her fans in German.

The mum-of-four later posted a video to her Instagram feed that showed off her sensational figure.

Don't miss...

In the clip, the German native was seen showering outdoors wearing a plunging black bikini top and tie-side bottoms.

The barely-there swimsuit was complimented by a gold body chain, and Heidi herself didn’t look to be wearing makeup.

The caption of the video simply read “cold” followed by a sun and splashing water emoji.

Heidi met the Tokio Hotel guitarist, Tom, while she was working on Germany’s Next Top Model.

According to Us Weekly, the pair “fell into an easy rhythm really quickly” but it wasn’t until 2018 that the pair confirmed their relationship status.

In the early days of dating, Heidi told People that Tom was, “the kindest, sweetest, most caring, loving person. I feel so lucky".

She also stated that she didn’t know “the last time I was this happy in my life” and that she thought that the musician was “absolutely wonderful”.

After just eight months of dating, Heidi announced via social media that she and Tom were engaged to be married.

In February 2019, the duo tied the knot and details of the pair’s marriage were released to the press five months later.
